   "body_snippet": "Simple question I hope, love the program :-)\r\n\r\nI work with VMware and Nutanix, I'm looking for something to simply import bookmarks.html in mRemoteNG, instead of doing a scan all over the world in our network.\r\n\r\nAnd instead of config view, I like to have right-click and properties/config\r\n",

+    {
+      "seq": 1,
+      "date": "2026-02-17",
+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "Adding support for importing Netscape Bookmark File Format (bookmarks.html) allows users to easily migrate connections from web browsers."
+    }
+  ],
   "comments": [],
   "comments_cursor": "2018-11-01T18:46:14Z",
   "unread_comments": 0,
   "needs_action": false,
   "waiting_for_us": false,
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (gemini): Adding support for importing Netscape Bookmark File Format (bookmarks.html) allows users to easily migrate connections from web browsers.\nApproach: Create a new `BookmarksHtmlImporter` class to parse the standard Netscape Bookmark HTML format (DL/DT/H3/A tags) and map them to mRemoteNG folders and connections. Update `App.Import` to register the new importer and add `.html` to the file dialog filters."
 }

diff --git a/mRemoteNG/App/Import.cs b/mRemoteNG/App/Import.cs
index f357dbde4..d991a77e2 100644
--- a/mRemoteNG/App/Import.cs
+++ b/mRemoteNG/App/Import.cs
@@ -26,12 +26,13 @@ namespace mRemoteNG.App
                     openFileDialog.Multiselect = true;
 
                     List<string> fileTypes = new();
-                    fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {Language.FilterAllImportable, "*.xml;*.rdp;*.rdg;*.dat;*.csv"});
+                    fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {Language.FilterAllImportable, "*.xml;*.rdp;*.rdg;*.dat;*.csv;*.html"});
                     fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {Language.FiltermRemoteXML, "*.xml"});
                     fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {Language.FiltermRemoteCSV, "*.csv"});
                     fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {Language.FilterRDP, "*.rdp"});
                     fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {Language.FilterRdgFiles, "*.rdg"});
                     fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {Language.FilterPuttyConnectionManager, "*.dat"});
+                    fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {"Netscape Bookmark Files (*.html)", "*.html"});
                     fileTypes.AddRange(new[] {Language.FilterAll, "*.*"});
                     fileTypes.AddRange(new[] { Language.FilterSecureCRT, "*.crt" });
 
@@ -175,6 +176,8 @@ namespace mRemoteNG.App
                     return new RemoteDesktopConnectionManagerImporter();
                 case ".dat":
                     return new PuttyConnectionManagerImporter();
+                case ".html":
+                    return new BookmarksHtmlImporter();
                 case ".crt":
                     return new SecureCRTImporter();
                 default:
